original_text: And the revenger of blood find him without the borders of the city of his refuge, and the revenger of blood kill the slayer; he shall not be guilty of blood:
korean_text: 피를 보복하는 자가 도피성 지경 밖에서 그 살인자를 만나 죽일지라도 피 흘린 죄가 없나니

sentences.original_text: And the revenger of blood find him
without the borders of the city of his refuge
and the revenger of blood kill the slayer
he shall not be guilty of blood:
